description: MySQL is a relational database management system widely used for storing structured data.
experience: Designed schemas, wrote complex queries, and integrated with Spring Boot projects.
blog: MySQL is a solid foundation. Writing clean, optimized queries feels like solving puzzles.

description: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents.
experience: Used MongoDB in MERN stack apps. Built schemas with Mongoose, implemented CRUD, and deployed backend.
blog: MongoDB is chill and flexible. It fits perfectly with modern web apps and rapid prototyping.
